property.name: title
property.label: Toast Title
property.description: Title to display. For Example, Record Created

property.name: message
property.label: Toast Message
property.description: Message you want to display. For Example, 'Record {0} created! See it {1}!'

property.name: variant
property.label: Toast Variant
property.description: Type of toast you want to display. Valid values are info, success, warning, error

property.name: delay
property.label: Delay
property.description: Time in milli seconds If you want the delay to display the toast.

property.name: recordName
property.label: Record Name
property.description: The Name of the record which has been created. For Example, Oil Gas Account

property.name: url
property.label: Navigate to URL
property.description: URL where user will be redirected after clicking on the link

property.name: actionLabel
property.label: Button Label
property.description: The text which will be dislayed over the url. For Example, Click Here, Here, Go to
